oai_dc:dc.dc:description: When an eland has been shot, |kaggen (the Mantis) buzzes in the hunters' ears, stands on their eyebrows and looks in their quivers to find the 'offending' arrow. He looks at the bowstrings to see if they have been used.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What |kaggen does when an eland has been shot
